info.title: 企业站建设
info.description:
企业站建设api规范。
所有错误返回json格式为{"code":0,"data":{"message":"错误消息"}}
所有执行成功返回json格式为{"code":1,"data":{"message":"成功消息"}}
api编辑器地址 https://editor.swagger.io/

post.summary: 微信用户登录。后台根据用户的注册(认证状态)返回不同的信息，注意看返回示例

200.description: 注册成功后返回用户对应注册信息

个人注册成功范例.value: {"platform":"0","type":0,"avatar":"http://www.youku.com/1.jpg","auth_status":"2","real_name":"张三","identity":"370302199008523210","id_card_front":"http://www.baidu.com/1.jpg","id_card_back":"http://www.baidu.com/2.jpg","license":"","contact_mobile":"13793332406","latitude":"43464.15646","longitude":"46546.1616","province":"山东省","city":"淄博市","district":"张店区","address":"博大花园"}

企业注册成功范例.value: {"platform":"1","type":1,"avatar":"http://www.youku.com/1.jpg","auth_status":"2","real_name":"门叮叮有限公司","identity":"370302199008523210","id_card_front":"","id_card_back":"","license":"http://www.baidu.com/1.jpg","contact_mobile":"13793332406","latitude":"43464.15646","longitude":"46546.1616","province":"山东省","city":"淄博市","district":"张店区","address":"博大花园"}

token.description: 微信用户登录时返回的token

type.description: 用户类型：0 个人用户 1 企业用户

identity.description: 身份证号码/营业执照号码

200.description: 新建/修改成功后返回信息，修改任务的时候，请求里会带taskid字段

新增请求范例.value: {"name":"门叮叮安装","type":[{"dictValue":0,"dictLabel":"安装"},{"dictValue":2,"dictLabel":"保养"}],"latitude":"1313313.3222","longitude":"13131.333","province":"山东","city":"淄博","district":"张店区","address":"博达花园2525","contact_mobile":"联系人电话","charges":"25.33","description":"来安装吧","poster":["https://gimg2.baidu.com/image_search/src=http%3A%2F%2Fimg.jj20.com%2Fup%2Fallimg%2F1114%2F062021132H5%2F210620132H5-1-1200.jpg&refer=http%3A%2F%2Fimg.jj20.com&app=2002&size=f9999,10000&q=a80&n=0&g=0n&fmt=auto?sec=1653010288&t=5d051b2302b1f9cf69d88aa8691b4659"],"time_shigong":"2022-04-20"}

right.description: 是否有权限。0:无权限；1：有权限

isOwner.description: 是否是自己发布的任务；0：不是自己发布的任务；1，是自己发布的任务(返回是string或者int类型的均可)

isGrabed.description: 是否已经抢单；0：未抢单；1：已抢单

isMyOrder.description: 如果是已抢单，是否是自己抢到的订单；0：否；1：是

dictLabel.description: 值 如：安装、维修、保养

请求成功范例.value: {"right":1,"name":"门叮叮安装","publisher":"李四","isOwner":"0","isGrabed":"0","isMyOrder":"0","avatar":"http://www.baidu.com/2.jpg","type":[{"dictValue":0,"dictLabel":"安装"},{"dictValue":2,"dictLabel":"保养"}],"latitude":"36.828794","longitude":"118.040838","province":"山东","city":"淄博","district":"张店区","address":"博达花园2525","contact_mobile":"联系人电话","charges":"25.33","description":"来安装吧","poster":["https://gimg2.baidu.com/image_search/src=http%3A%2F%2Fimg.jj20.com%2Fup%2Fallimg%2F1114%2F062021132H5%2F210620132H5-1-1200.jpg&refer=http%3A%2F%2Fimg.jj20.com&app=2002&size=f9999,10000&q=a80&n=0&g=0n&fmt=auto?sec=1653010288&t=5d051b2302b1f9cf69d88aa8691b4659"],"time_shigong":"2022-04-20","time":"2022-04-20"}

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: 根据任务id，获取任务信息

items.description: 任务类型。0：安装;1:维修;2:保养

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: 搜索任务类型，默认为空

parameters.name: minPrice
parameters.description: 费用区间最底价，默认空

parameters.name: maxPrice
parameters.description: 费用区间最高价，默认空

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: 根据公告id，获取详细信息

200.description: 调用微信支付所需信息

timeStamp.description: 时间戳，从 1970 年 1 月 1 日 00:00:00 至今的秒数，即当前的时间

nonceStr.description: 随机字符串，长度为32个字符以下

package.description: 统一下单接口返回的 prepay_id 参数值，提交格式如：prepay_id=***

signType.description: 签名算法，应与后台下单时的值一致

get.summary: 获取各种状态订单的数量

200.description: 获取各种状态订单的数量

items.description: 各种状态订单的数量 商家（[2,3,4,2,3,4]，对应原型图的六个状态，待接单、接单待完工、完工待评价、已完成、已关闭、申请关闭中）

billState.description: 订单状态0、1、2、3、4、5、6，对应原型图的六个状态，待接单、接单待完工、完工待评价、已完成、已关闭、申请关闭中）

请求成功范例.value: [{"id":10,"taskId":52,"billState":0,"name":"门叮叮安装","publisher":"张三","type":[{"dictValue":"0","dictLabel":"安装"},{"dictValue":"2","dictLabel":"保养"}],"charges":"25.33","time":"2022-04-20"},{"id":10,"taskId":52,"billState":1,"name":"门叮叮安装","publisher":"张三","type":[{"dictValue":"0","dictLabel":"安装"},{"dictValue":"2","dictLabel":"保养"}],"charges":"25.33","time":"2022-04-20"},{"id":10,"taskId":52,"billState":2,"name":"门叮叮安装","publisher":"张三","type":[{"dictValue":"0","dictLabel":"安装"},{"dictValue":"2","dictLabel":"保养"}],"charges":"25.33","time":"2022-04-20"},{"id":10,"taskId":52,"billState":3,"name":"门叮叮安装","publisher":"张三","type":[{"dictValue":"0","dictLabel":"安装"},{"dictValue":"2","dictLabel":"保养"}],"charges":"25.33","time":"2022-04-20"},{"id":10,"taskId":52,"billState":4,"name":"门叮叮安装","publisher":"张三","type":[{"dictValue":"0","dictLabel":"安装"},{"dictValue":"2","dictLabel":"保养"}],"charges":"25.33","time":"2022-04-20"},{"id":10,"taskId":52,"billState":5,"name":"门叮叮安装","publisher":"张三","type":[{"dictValue":"0","dictLabel":"安装"},{"dictValue":"2","dictLabel":"保养"}],"charges":"25.33","time":"2022-04-20"},{"id":10,"taskId":52,"billState":0,"name":"门叮叮安装","publisher":"张三","type":[{"dictValue":"0","dictLabel":"安装"},{"dictValue":"2","dictLabel":"保养"}],"charges":"25.33","time":"2022-04-20"},{"id":10,"taskId":52,"billState":0,"name":"门叮叮安装","publisher":"张三","type":[{"dictValue":"0","dictLabel":"安装"},{"dictValue":"2","dictLabel":"保养"}],"charges":"25.33","time":"2022-04-20"},{"id":10,"taskId":52,"billState":0,"name":"门叮叮安装","publisher":"张三","type":[{"dictValue":"0","dictLabel":"安装"},{"dictValue":"2","dictLabel":"保养"}],"charges":"25.33","time":"2022-04-20"},{"id":10,"taskId":52,"billState":0,"name":"门叮叮安装","publisher":"张三","type":[{"dictValue":"0","dictLabel":"安装"},{"dictValue":"2","dictLabel":"保养"}],"charges":"25.33","time":"2022-04-20"}]

parameters.name: billState
parameters.description: 任务状态，-1是全部、0(待完工/待接单)、1待评论、2待完成、3、已关闭

billState.description: 订单状态0、1、2、3、4、5，对应原型图的六个状态，待接单、接单待完工、完工待评价、已完成、已关闭、申请关闭中）

type.description: 用户类型：0 个人用户 1 企业用户

invoiceStatus.description: 开票状态,0未开票，1已开票

rate.description: 服务感受打分,0：好评，1：一般，2，差评;

timeApply.description: 申请关闭订单时的时间,精确到秒

messageShangjia.description: 关闭订单，商家描述信息

timeClosed.description: 关闭订单时的时间,精确到秒,没有关闭的时候，这个值返回空字符串

messsageFuwushang.description: 关闭订单，服务商描述信息,系统自动关闭返回空字符串

messageOther.description: 超时未确认，系统自动关闭，显示这条信息，服务商关闭，此条返回空字符串

请求成功范例.value: {"billState":1,"userInfo":{"avatar":"http://www.baidu.com/1.jpg","name":"李四","type":0,"contact_mobile":"13793332406"},"billInfo":{"orderNumber":"MDD22041200001","timeBuild":"2022-04-12 17:00","billPay":"0.00","invoiceStatus":"0"},"evaluate":{"rate":0,"message":"客户评论：安装得非常仔细，客户很满意，期待下次合作！","poster":["http://www.baidu.com/2.jpg"]},"proof":{"message":"高创园A座的自动门已完成安装，请验收！","poster":["http://www.baidu.com/3.jpg"]},"closeInfo":{"timeApply":"2022-04-03 10:00:00","messageShangjia":"客户所在地区因疫情无法按时施工，任务暂时需要关闭，疫情过后重新发布。","timeClosed":"2022-05-01  10:00:00","messsageFuwushang":"已线下沟通，同意关闭本任务。","messageOther":"超时未确认，系统自动关闭。"},"taskInfo":{"taskId":44,"name":"淄博高创园A座平开门安装维...","type":[{"dictValue":"0","dictLabel":"安装"},{"dictValue":"1","dictLabel":"维护"},{"dictValue":"2","dictLabel":"保养"}],"charges":"1000","time_shigong":"2022-05-01","address":"博大花园"}}

parameters.name: taskId
parameters.description: 根据订单列表获取到的订单taskId,或者支付成功对应的taskid跳转，获取订单详情

post.summary: 发票申请(服务商抢单消费发票申请)

orderNumber.description: 订单编号，点击申请发票时带过来

rate.description: 服务感受打分,0：好评，1：一般，2，差评;

post.description: 服务商完成后提交服务凭证
订单生成后商家申请关闭订单
商家申请关闭订单后，服务商处理申请

get.summary: 获取公司宣传轮播图片

open_url.description: 点击图片打开的网址，可能为空

请求成功范例.value:

url.description: 图片/文件上传后返回的地址

name.description: 图片/文件上传后返回的图片的名字

dictLabel.description: 值 如：安装、维修、保养

article_status.description: 文章状态，不可见/可见/已删除

comment_status.description: 未评论/已经评论/禁止评论

mode.description: 忘记这个字段做什么的了

addtime.description: 文章添加时间，目前和文章发布时间相同

type.description: 用户类型：0 个人用户 1 企业用户

auth_status.description: 认证状态：0 未认证 1 等待认证 2 认证通过 3 认证失败

identity.description: 身份证号码/营业执照号码

dictLabel.description: 值 如：安装、维修、保养

items.description: 任务类型。0：安装;1:维修;2:保养

code.description: 消息码。0:失败；1：成功(常用在update,insert,delete等返回执行结果);
